fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
* Make an item every night and choose to keep it or give it away. It may not already exist. Items cannot interfere or change this in any way. You may only keep 2 items throughout the game. Items cannot increase this limit or modify it in any way.
* People will be given the item and a description of whatever it does whenever the host sends them the message of it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: * You may act ONCE every phase. This cannot be changed or edited in any way.

fields.name: Addendum:
fields.value: * Items may not consist of solely instant effects and must always carry a manually activateable effect

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have at least 6 items used this game. Items cannot modify this wincon, but may add additional ones. All have to be met to win.
